title: Rediscovered harmonies
creator_credit: Lucien Peroisy and Sofidoc S A
brief_description: The origin of different musical instruments. The Music Instrumental du Conservatoire de Brussels has a large collection of instruments some dating from prehistoric times. The film uses this collection to present an insight into the origin of musical instruments and describes the development from the Middle Ages to the present.
